name: CoverageEligibilityRequest
title: CoverageEligibilityRequest
description: The CoverageEligibilityRequest provides patient and insurance coverage information to an insurer for them to respond, in the form of an CoverageEligibilityResponse, with information regarding whether the stated coverage is valid and in-force and optionally to provide the insurance details of the policy.

elements.name: CoverageEligibilityRequest
elements.description: The CoverageEligibilityRequest provides patient and insurance coverage information to an insurer for them to respond.

elements.name: identifier
elements.description: A unique identifier assigned to this coverage eligibility request.

elements.name: status
elements.description: The status of the resource instance.

elements.name: priority
elements.description: When the requestor expects the processor to complete processing.

elements.name: purpose
elements.description: Code to specify whether requesting: prior authorization requirements for some service categories or billing codes; benefits for coverages specified or discovered; discovery and return of coverages for the patient; and/or validation that the specified coverage is in-force at the date/period specified or 'now' if not specified.

elements.name: patient
elements.description: The party who is the beneficiary of the supplied coverage and for whom eligibility is sought.

elements.name: servicedDate
elements.description: The date or dates when the enclosed suite of services were performed or completed.

elements.name: servicedPeriod
elements.description: The date or dates when the enclosed suite of services were performed or completed.

elements.name: created
elements.description: The date when this resource was created.

elements.name: provider
elements.description: The provider which is responsible for the request.

elements.name: insurer
elements.description: The Insurer who issued the coverage in question and is the recipient of the request.

elements.name: facility
elements.description: Facility where the services are intended to be provided.

elements.name: supportingInfo
elements.description: Additional information codes regarding exceptions, special considerations, the condition, situation, prior or concurrent issues.

elements.name: insurance
elements.description: Financial instruments for reimbursement for the health care products and services.

elements.name: item
elements.description: Service categories or billable services for which benefit details and/or an authorization prior to service delivery may be required by the payor.
